attributes.action: recommend a posthumous knighthood for the late Bobby Moore.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The late Bobby Moore was not recognised appropriately in his own lifetime, we have the opportunity to put this right. It may be too late in some ways but it is the best we can do.

rejection.details: Sorry, the PM cannot award posthumous knighthoods
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
